news.title: SEC drops lawsuit against Winklevoss twins’ Gemini crypto exchange
news.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission has dropped its lawsuit against Gemini, the crypto exchange founded by Trump backers Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss.

news.title: A new test for AI labs: Are you even trying to make money?
news.summary: It’s getting hard to tell which AI labs. are actually trying to make money. We created a rating system to help sort it out.

news.title: How PopWheels helped a food cart ditch generators for e-bike batteries
news.summary: PopWheels realized its battery swapping network could be used for more than food delivery workers who need to charge their e-bikes. Now, its planning for an "aggressive rollout" this summer.

news.title: Legal AI giant Harvey acquires Hexus as competition heats up in legal tech
news.summary: Hexus founder and CEO Sakshi Pratap, who previously held engineering roles at Walmart, Oracle, and Google, tells TechCrunch that her San Francisco-based team has already joined Harvey, while the startup's India-based engineers will come onboard once Harvey establishes a Bangalore office.

news.title: Apple iPhone just had its best year in India as the smartphone market stays broadly flat
news.summary: Apple shipped a record 14 million iPhones in India in 2025 and gained market share.

news.title: Gmail’s spam filter and automatic sorting are broken
news.summary: Some Gmail users have noticed that promotional emails that normally go to their own siloed tab have started flooding their inbox. news.title: ICE has killed another person in Minneapolis
news.summary: Federal agents in Minneapolis repeatedly punched a man, forced him to the ground, and then shot him multiple times. The man was later pronounced dead. news.title: Gaming’s most fun sales data is full of old and obscure games

news.title: Get ready for the AI ad-pocalypse
news.summary: I'll confess, with no shame whatsoever, that I really love ads.
